overview: Avery Harrison is finally on his way to climbing the corporate ladder. After a festive rooftop celebration in honor of his hard work, he comes home to find out that his boyfriend of three years, Gerard, has been cheating on him. In true Capricorn fashion, he makes the abrupt decision to move out over the weekend and back into his parentâ€™s home in Baldwin Hills.
tagline: Grown in the world... A child at home.
title: Literally Annoyed
